DOC.brief_title: Hawthorn Extract Randomized Blinded Chronic Heart Failure ( HERB CHF ) Trial
DOC.criteria: Ambulatory individual 18 year old diagnose CHF ( NYHA functional class IIIV ) > 3 month Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) ≤ 40 percent Receiving indicate standard therapy ( contraindicate intolerant > 3 month ) define diuretic , ACEinhibitor angiotensin receptor blocker ( ARB ) betablocke Patients NYHA class III IV symptom also require receive spironolactone . Doses drug stable ≥ 3 month , except diuretic , ≥ 1 month stability require . Hemodynamically severe uncorrected primary valvular disease Active myocarditis Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy Restrictive cardiomyopathy Myocardial infarction , stroke , unstable angina , coronary artery bypass graft surgery , valvular surgery , angioplasty < 3 month randomization Symptomatic sustain ventricular tachycardia control antiarrhythmic drug implantable cardioverterdefibrillator Any condition heart failure would expect limit exercise ( e.g. , angina , peripheral vascular disease , pulmonary disease , arthritis , orthopedic problem severe enough limit exercise ) Nursing mother , pregnant woman plan pregnancy study period
